actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to areawide waste treatment management plans.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to establish procedures for the certification by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency of State areawide management plans for areas not previously designated as having serious water quality problems.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act relating to areawide waste treatment management plans.
